title: When remote sensing data meet ubiquitous urban data:Fine-grained air quality Inference
venue: IEEE International Conference on Big Data(Big Data)
excerpt: This paper solved the fine-grained air quality inference problem with urban data and satellite data.
citation: Yanan Xu, Yanmin Zhu. (2016). "When remote sensing data meet ubiquitous urban data:Fine-grained air quality inference." IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data). (1252-1261).

title: Leveraging app usage contexts for app recommendation: a neural approach
excerpt: This paper is about APP recommendation using APP usage data.
citation: Yanan Xu, Yanmin Zhu, Yanyan Shen, Jiadi Yu. (2018). "Leveraging app usage contexts for app recommendation: a neural approach." World Wide Web Journal. 1(2).

title: Fusing Satellite Data and Urban Data for Business Location Selection: A Neural Approach
excerpt: This paper is about the number 3. The number 4 is left for future work.
citation: Yanan Xu, Yanyan Shen, Yanmin Zhu, Jiadi Yu. (2018). "Fusing Satellite Data and Urban Data for Business Location Selection: A Neural Approach." DASFAA. 2(589-605).

title: Urban noise mapping with a crowd sensing system
excerpt: This paper is about urban noise inference with a matrix completion method.
citation: Yanan Xu, Yanmin Zhu, Zhaokun Qin. (2019). "Urban noise mapping with a crowd sensing system." Wireless Networks. 25(5).

title: Fine-Grained Air Quality Inference with Remote Sensing Data and Ubiquitous Urban Data
excerpt: This paper is about inferring fine-grained air quality with satellite data and urban data.
citation: Yanan Xu, Yanmin Zhu, Yanyan Shen, Jiadi Yu. (2019). "Fine-Grained Air Quality Inference with Remote Sensing Data and Ubiquitous Urban Data." TKDD. 13(5).

title: Learning Shared Vertex Representation in Heterogeneous Graphs with Convolutional Networks for Recommendation
excerpt: This paper is about mining three kinds of information from interaction sequences using graph convolutional networks for item recommendation.
citation: Yanan Xu, Yanmin Zhu, Yanyan Shen, Jiadi Yu. (2019). "Learning Shared Vertex Representation in Heterogeneous Graphs with Convolutional Networks for Recommendation." IJCAI. 1(4620-4626).

title: AR2Net: An Attentive Neural Approach for Business Location Selection with Satellite Data and Urban Data
excerpt: This paper is about selecting the optimal locations for opening business shops.
citation: Yanan Xu, Yanyan Shen, Yanmin Zhu, Jiadi Yu. (2020). "AR2Net: An Attentive Neural Approach for Business Location Selection with Satellite Data and Urban Data." TKDD. 14(2).

title: Modeling long-term and short-term interests with parallel attentions for session-based recommendation
excerpt: This paper is about recommending next items by modeling long-term and short-term interest using attention mechanism.
citation: Jing Zhu, Yanan Xu, Yanmin Zhu. (2020). "Modeling long-term and short-term interests with parallel attentions for session-based recommendation." DASFAA. 1(2).

title: Learning from heterogeneous student behaviors for multiple prediction tasks
excerpt: This paper is about leveraging students' heterogeneous behaviors to complete various prediction tasks.
citation: Haobing Liu, Yanmin Zhu, Yanan Xu. (2020). "Learning from heterogeneous student behaviors for multiple prediction tasks." DASFAA. 1(3).
